data.eml:eml: A new species of large green treefrog (Anura: Hylidae: Litoria) from northern New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Richards, Stephen J., Oliver, Paul, Dahl, Chris, Tjaturadi, Burhan (2006): A new species of large green treefrog (Anura: Hylidae: Litoria) from northern New Guinea. Zootaxa 1208: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172420
